channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shorts folding, records tumbling, inflows mounting, bitcoin’s unstoppable ascent takes another leg up.
item.description: Bitcoin hit a fresh high above $118,000 on Friday a day after the second-highest daily inflows on record to bitcoin ETFs.

item.title: $8.8 trillion protected: How one CISO went from ‘that’s BS’ to bulletproof in 90 days
item.description: Clearwater Analytics CISO Sam Evans dodged a bullet by blocking shadow AI from exposing data integral to $8.8 trillion under management.

item.title: How celebrity fitness trainer Ally Love created a health and wellness haven in her Jersey City apartment
item.description: Celebrity fitness trainer Ally Love is no stranger to spreading the gospel of health and fitness, and now reveals how she has extended those teachings...

item.title: Here are three big things the market is getting wrong about U.S. stocks, says this bank
item.description: The market is underestimating U.S. growth and is too pessimistic about earnings, says HSBC.

item.title: I’m 70, a widow and struggled financially. How do I let go of the resentment I feel towards my wealthy, unhelpful brother?
item.description: “I’m now doing better financially than I ever thought I would. My house in Tucson is valued at $416,000.”

item.title: I’m 52. Should I divorce my older husband so he can claim my Social Security benefits sooner?
item.description: “My husband is 58 — six years older than me.”

item.title: Elon Musk introduced Grok 4 last night, calling it the ‘smartest AI in the world’ — what businesses need to know
item.description: Musk did not apologize nor did he accept responsibility for Grok's antisemitic, sexually offensive, and conspiratorial remarks.

item.title: Employee AI agent adoption: Maximizing gains while navigating challenges
item.description: At Transform 2025, BCG's Matthew Kropp offered a game plan for agentic AI workflow evolution, employee adoption, and organizational change.

item.title: AWS doubles down on infrastructure as strategy in the AI race with SageMaker upgrades
item.description: AWS upgraded its SageMaker platform to offer more observability and streamlined functions to make AI model inference and training easier.

item.title: Open vs. closed models: AI leaders from GM, Zoom and IBM weigh trade-offs for enterprise use
item.description: Experts from General Motors, Zoom and IBM discuss how their companies and customers consider AI model selection.
